issue.subject: Filter on organism selection fails in view=orders and view=resources
issue.description:
We have detected two cases :

* *case 1 : in view=orders (front-end)*, the filter displays all organisms where the connected user has a role
--> It should only display in the list organisms where the user is "member of" OR the user is "organism manager" > 1 

_nb : if the user has no role (ony "member of"), the filter should not be displayed since it's unacessary._



* *case 2 : in view=resources (front-end)*, the filter displays all organisms where the connected user has "role validation"
--> It should only display the list or organisms where the user has at leat one of the following roles :
- Resource manager
- Medatada manager
- Metadata editor
- Diffusion manager
- Preview manager
- Extraction manager
- Organism manager



------


By the way, for both lists, the name of organisms are ordered "strangely". It should be ordered alphabetically.
